name: Cadaver
description:
Cadaver is an arcade game developed by The Bitmap Brothers, Bitmap Brothers, The and Bitmap Brothers. It was originally released in 1990. ImageWorks published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Cadaver on Atari ST, Commodore / Amiga and PC.
Graeme Boxall produced the game. Richard Joseph scored the game.
